segments.text: Honey , I think you should quit smoking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? You said I was hot when smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I want you to be fit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Check out this article . It says smoking can lead to lung cancer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t believe it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you know that smoking does harm to health , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I know it , but you know it's hard to quit smoking ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stop beating around the bush . Will you quit or not ?
segments.speaker: S1
